New Records: Rohit Sharma scored the fastest 92 off 41 balls against Australia
Key Match Events: Travis Head's 76 kept Australia in the game
David Warner was dismissed for 6 in the first over of the chase
Mitch Marsh was superbly caught by Axar Patel on the boundary
Glenn Maxwell was bowled by Kuldeep Yadav for 19 off 12 deliveries
Travis Head was caught trying to take on Jasprit Bumrah
Rohit Sharma was named the Player of the Match for his brilliant 92 off 41 deliveries
Pre-Game Insights: Experts predicted India as the favorites given their home advantage
Post-Match Reflections: Mitch Marsh said Australia backed themselves to chase down the score when Glenn Maxwell and Travis Head were together in the middle
Rohit Sharma said India played well and took a lot of confidence from the game
Rohit Sharma said India doesn't want to change its approach for the semis
Miscellaneous Highlights: India maintained their unbeaten record in the Super Eights
Australia's World Cup hopes are hanging by a thread after falling victim to an all-out assault from Rohit Sharma
